npcSpeech.text: I'm a contractor. If you ever need anything done give me a call.
Hmmm... just busy. The work is picking up these days... I wish I could leave it all but that's just not practical. Do I regret it? Not yet?
It's like any other building job... If you're trying to get more information about Gemtech's technology I can't help you.
Oh come on you must have heard of them.

response.text: Please tell me what you know.

npcSpeech.text: Like I said. I don't know anything.
No... I wish I had stayed like you.
Really, there's nothing more I can tell you. Our company is called IHCC. The Imp Human Construction Company. If you need anything just call me.
